trans-unit.source: Retrieves a registered handle to the specified event log

seg-source.mrk: Retrieves a registered handle to the specified event log

target.mrk: Retrieves a registered handle to the specified event log

trans-unit.source: The UNC name of the server on where the event log will be opened. If blank, the operation is performed on the local computer.

seg-source.mrk: The UNC name of the server on where the event log will be opened.
If blank, the operation is performed on the local computer.

target.mrk: The UNC name of the server on where the event log will be opened.
If blank, the operation is performed on the local computer.

trans-unit.source: The name of the event source whose handle is to be retrieved. The source name must be a subkey of a log under the Eventlog registry key.

seg-source.mrk: The name of the event source whose handle is to be retrieved.
The source name must be a subkey of a log under the Eventlog registry key.

target.mrk: The name of the event source whose handle is to be retrieved.
The source name must be a subkey of a log under the Eventlog registry key.

trans-unit.source: the handle to an event log.

seg-source.mrk: the handle to an event log.

target.mrk: the handle to an event log.

trans-unit.source: If the source name cannot be found, the event logging service uses the Application log; it does not create a new source.

seg-source.mrk: If the source name cannot be found, the event logging service uses the Application log; it does not create a new source.

target.mrk: If the source name cannot be found, the event logging service uses the Application log; it does not create a new source.

trans-unit.source: Events are reported for the source, however, there are no message and category message files specified for looking up descriptions of the event identifiers for the source.

seg-source.mrk: Events are reported for the source, however, there are no message and category message files specified for looking up descriptions of the event identifiers for the source.

target.mrk: Events are reported for the source, however, there are no message and category message files specified for looking up descriptions of the event identifiers for the source.

trans-unit.source: To close the handle to the event log, use the _EventLog__DeregisterSource().

seg-source.mrk: To close the handle to the event log, use the _EventLog__DeregisterSource().

target.mrk: To close the handle to the event log, use the _EventLog__DeregisterSource().
